title: Drawing, "Designs for glass scent bottles", ca. 1850
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and gouache, gold paint over graphite on cream wove paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown ink, recto: style numbers of each of the six bottles; verso: style numbers of each of the six bottles
description: Recto: six designs for bottles with stoppers, each with style written below; Verso: designs for six other bottles with stoppers, numbered below.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Designs for glass scent bottles", ca. 1850.
ca. 1850. Pen and brown ink, brush and gouache, gold paint over graphite on cream wove paper. Gift of Virginia Hamill. 1953-82-1.
